display.title: Battery Health Report from Tesla Data
display.summary_excellent: This {vehicleName} demonstrates excellent battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing exceptionally well for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle represents an excellent purchase opportunity with minimal battery-related risks.
display.summary_good: This {vehicleName} demonstrates good battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing well for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle represents a good purchase opportunity with normal wear patterns.
display.summary_fair: This {vehicleName} demonstrates fair battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing adequately for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle shows higher than average degradation and should be considered carefully.

payment.title: Get Your Verified Certificate
payment.description: Unlock your official Tesla battery health certificate for just $10

gdpr.title: We respect your privacy
gdpr.message: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Your Tesla data is processed securely and never shared with third parties.

tesla_data.title: Tesla Account Data
tesla_data.description: When you authorize batterycert.com to access your Tesla account, we temporarily collect vehicle battery information, charging data, and basic vehicle specifications necessary for our assessment.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.description: For paid certificates, we collect your email address and payment information through Stripe. We do not store credit card details on our servers.

usage_info.title: Usage Information
usage_info.description: We collect basic analytics about how you use our service, including browser type, operating system, and pages visited to improve our service.

how_we_use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.description1: Your Tesla data is used exclusively to generate battery health assessments. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties except as required for payment processing or legal compliance.
how_we_use.description2: Email addresses are used to send certificate downloads and optional service updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.

data_security.title: 3. Data Security
data_security.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. Tesla access tokens are used temporarily and discarded immediately after assessment completion. All data transmission is encrypted using TLS.

data_retention.title: 4. Data Retention
data_retention.description: Tesla account data is not permanently stored. Paid certificate data is retained for 1 year to provide ongoing verification services. Anonymous usage analytics may be retained longer for service improvement.

your_rights.title: 5. Your Rights
your_rights.description1: You have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information. For certificate verification purposes, some data may be retained longer than standard deletion timelines.
your_rights.description2: To exercise these rights, contact us through our support channels with your certificate ID or account information.

third_party.title: 6. Third-Party Services
third_party.description1: We use Stripe for payment processing and may use analytics services to understand service usage. These services have their own privacy policies and data handling practices.
third_party.description2: Tesla API access is governed by Tesla's own privacy policy and terms of service.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated via email or through prominent notices on our service.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.description: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your data rights, please contact TidyCalls LTD. through our official support channels or legal department.

footer.copyright: © {year} batterycert.com, a TidyCalls LTD. company. All rights reserved.

about.title: About batterycert.com
about.subtitle: batterycert.com was founded by the team behind TidyCalls with a simple mission: to bring transparency and trust to the used electric vehicle market.
about.mission_description: Our goal is to provide instant, accurate, and verifiable battery health certificates for Tesla vehicles. By leveraging direct API access, we eliminate guesswork and empower owners and buyers with the data they need to make informed decisions.
about.values_description: We are committed to integrity, accuracy, and user experience. We treat your data with the highest security, never store your Tesla credentials, and provide a seamless flow to get you from login to results in seconds.
about.company_description: With years of experience building robust, user-friendly applications at TidyCalls, we bring the same dedication to quality and security to batterycert.com.
about.legal_description: We are committed to transparency in our operations. You can view our legal documents below.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using batterycert.com ("Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this Service.
terms.service_text: batterycert.com provides Tesla battery health assessment services through direct API integration with Tesla's systems. We offer free basic assessments and paid detailed certificates for vehicle buyers and sellers.
terms.accounts_text: To use our service, you must authorize batterycert.com to access your Tesla account data. We do not store your Tesla credentials. Access is temporary and used exclusively for the purpose of battery assessment.
terms.payment_text: Paid certificates are processed through Stripe. All sales are final. Refunds may be considered on a case-by-case basis within 7 days of purchase if technical issues prevent certificate generation.
terms.privacy_text: We respect your privacy and handle your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Tesla account data is processed temporarily and not permanently stored on our servers.
terms.accuracy_text: While we strive for accuracy, battery health assessments are estimates based on available data. Results should be used as guidance and not as a guarantee or warranty of actual battery condition.
terms.liability_text: batterycert.com and TidyCalls LTD. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.
terms.law_text: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which TidyCalls LTD. is incorporated.
terms.changes_text: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or through the service interface.
terms.contact_text: For questions about these terms, please contact us through our support channels or visit our Privacy Policy for data-related inquiries.

stripe_receipt.footer: View your certificate online using the link above. Keep this receipt for your records.

invoice.questions: If you have any questions, please contact our customer support team.
